experiment.title: GhTopSearch
experiment.summary: Counts the number of unique committers in a set of Github repositories supplied in a CSV-file in the form of (ownerName, repoName)-tuples and stores the result in a CSV-file in the form of (repoUrl, uniqueCommitterCount)-tuples.
experiment.description: To contribute to this workflow, you need to download ${link} and then run the following command in your terminal ${command}.
